summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4729 for the improvement of Arlington Place from 30th Avenue to 32nd Avenue, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 54681, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
